website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning product that's a perennial go-to for a lot of people.
pros: The creamy consistency lightly hydrates as well as feeling good on the skin
The gentle cleanser is non-irritating so is especially good at removing eye makeup
cons: Some users did not like the fact that it doesn’t lather up much

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic Philosophy product
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't look or feel like the authentic product. I originally purchased from QVC and loved this item. I'm sending it back as it isn't the same at all. What I received was much thicker and a different color and smell than the authentic item I previously used. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hall

customer_reviews.title: Staple skin care product
customer_reviews.text: Purity is the only face wash that does the job! I have tried other cleansers and I always come back to Purity! It gets rid of ALL my makeup and I wear a lot of MAC cosmetics daily. I love pairing it with my clarisonic for gentle exfoliation. Best of all this is cheaper on Amazon than it is at Ulta or Sephora. Will definitely continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Philosophy Purity Made Simple, is a fragrance-free face wash. What's cool about it, is that it removes all traces of make up (including mascara). You can wash your entire face with it, you can even close your eyes and rub the face wash over your closed eyes and eyelashes, and removes all of the mascara and eyeliner, and it does not irritate your eyes. I can even open my eyes after I have the face wash all over them and it doesn't sting or burn. I great, gentle (but powerful) face wash that leaves your skins feeling soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Teacher

customer_reviews.title: A beauty consultant at Sephora recommend this product for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. A beauty consultant at Sephora recommend this product for me. I have dry skin and this stuff cleans well and is not drying out my skin. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many, many cleansers, but none are as good as this one. I use this year round because it's not over-drying, and does fine in the winter. This cleanser doesn't leave a residue, so you get squeaky clean skin without it feeling dry and tight. I feel like it really does what it says and keeps your face clean and balanced. I get zero breakouts from this, and I have tricky skin. It's the only cleanser I can use twice a day without my skin going crazy. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Rosi C.

customer_reviews.title: A Welcome Switch to What I was Previously Using
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend when I was looking to switch face washes. I had previously been using Clean and Clear for so many years just out of convenience, but finally decided it was not cutting it. I switched to this and love how well it cleans without being irritating to my skin. I can't say I use it twice a day like it says to, but it has worked so much better than what I was using, and from what I can tell doesn't have all those other chemicals in it. Only need to use a little at a time, so this bottle will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for washing off makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is a very gentle face wash that I find really takes off my make up after a long day. I usually put a lot of make up on and it really gets the make up out of your pores. Also it has not irritated my skin and I have been using it for a month. It doesn't really foam up but that's one of the only things I don't like about it. I also am not a fan of the scent. I'm not a fan of scented face washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this redhead!
customer_reviews.text: I am a redhead and have very sensitive skin and this is the only face wash I use that makes my skin feel clean without stripping it and leaving it dry! I have my teenager use it now! I just love it! It’s kind of expensive but I would highly recommend it to anyone who has sensitivity issues! I love that it makes my face feel moisturized yet clean feeling! The scent is soft and not overwhelming! This is a great product! I can not say enough good things about it!!
customer_reviews.author: Devo

customer_reviews.title: Philosophy Purity
customer_reviews.text: I've used philosophy products for many years... I sometimes venture out and try something "new" or different and bounce right back to Philosophy particularly with their cleansing line. There is little out there that can top Purity... I've tried HUGELY more expensive brands and WAY cheaper ones. Purity works very well - gently - but effectively... I like the faint, clean scent and it has never caused my skin any issue of any kind. Have been nervous to try buying through amazon with all the reports of fake products but so far so good. However, I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Beware of unwanted chemicals.....

customer_reviews.title: I love this facial cleanser

I prefer to use this over any oily make up removers that are out there. It's literally the best! I even use some of this on my fingers or palm of my hand to clean some of my brushes out. I'm not a make up expert so not sure if it damages the brushes, but mine look pretty good. I did recently buy the Too Faced Better Than Sex water proof mascara and unfortunately, it wasn't easily and completely removed with this wash. Either way, I still give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moreno

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cleanser for ME!

I'm a senior woman, who's blessed to look much younger than I actu in lily am. But, I was having to fight really hard to keep that. Decided to go back to using Purity, which I'd used for Yrs! I saw an immediate difference! I'll buy the 32 oz. size as soon as I'm able. And, I'll stick w/ Purity! For me, @ least, it makes too great a difference!
customer_reviews.author: sassytexasgirl

It did however clear up by morning so it wasn't a huge deal, just not for me! The smell is ok. Not delicious, but not overpowering. My skin felt almost a little greasy, like I had lotion on it, in the morning which is not typical. I didn't apply anything else because of the little flare up. All in all I can see how it could be a great product for some, but not for all! Wish I would've gotten the smaller size ;)

I love this face wash. It works great for my skin type and lasted a long time with washing my face twice a day. It's a shame that I wasted my money because it was a little cheaper through Amazon. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

Most important is that it never felt dry after washing! Loved it!

And while it does feel pricey compared to a grocery store face wash, it doesn't take much and it can last for a long time!

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: My everyday go to cleanser the best helps clear skin good on sensitive skin too !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: Leaves your skin smooth and silky and clean....i've tried MANY MANY face washes. This is a bit pricy but I think it's worth it. It's your skin and you gotta love the skin your in so BUY it if you can a little bit goes a LONG way so if you look at it hat way this bottle last me 3 months and i was my face (most days) twice in one day.

customer_reviews.title: Reviews say its a fake but seems to do the job for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was reading other reviews that state that this product is a fake and I don't know if it is or not but it seems to work just the same to me. It removes my mascara, etc. I like it so it gets 5 stars from me!

customer_reviews.text: Philosophy Purity One Step Cleanser.. have been using this cleanser for twenty years takes off all makeup and mascara leaves your face clean and soft.. works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this facewash and normally buy it in-store but decided to buy online this time. When I got the box there was no extra "cushion" in the box to stop the bottle from rolling around. The screw on cap was broken but luckily the seal was still on the bottle. I had another cap to put on from the previous bottle I bought so it wasn't an issue for me, but may be an issue for others.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi W

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER. IF I COULD SWIM IN IT I WOULD.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to explain how amazing this product is. I have gone through many a face washes and this is by far the best. It is gentle on the skin and it lasts forever (a little goes a long way!) absolutely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: EVan

customer_reviews.title: The best facial cleaner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, this is one of the best purchase in my life... Thanks for this incredible one step facial cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big clean freak when it comes to removing make-up or cleansing my face. This cleanser is a standard cleanser that I keep available at all times. After a wash, your face feels moisturized and soft. The scent is really mild and nice. This cleanser does not lather though. If you are a foam cleanser person, this is not a cleanser that you will like. If you wear a non-waterproof mascara, this cleanser will clean your lashes as well. (not so much for waterproof mascara) Very good product! Will buy more again :)
customer_reviews.author: Thirteen12

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 4 years now and love it. Doesn't break me out, doesn't dry out my face, and I can use it with a full face of makeup on and the makeup all gets removed.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing and I wish the entire world knew about it! My friend told me about it and her skin is always baby soft(she has pale skin aswell so that helps). I got it and I literally use nothing else as a face wash! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A_Danae

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I thought this will be a wonderful product. I have been using it for 2 weeks and I haven't noticed a difference. My pores aren't smaller, I have been breaking out more (I'm blaming the hot weather?), and my skin doesn't feel softer. It smells great and you only need to use a little. I don't know if I'm not giving it enough time to work, so I'm going to keep using it to see how it goes. I also bought some more products from philosophy so maybe in combination I'll get better results. I'll update my review if my results change.
customer_reviews.author: KLang

customer_reviews.title: Best gentle and beneficial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. Its great. Face feels clean and fresh everytime and smooth. Also it is not overly scented. Pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: if you have a face - you need this... on it.
customer_reviews.text: thank you, philosophy for creating the perfect face wash! I have unbelievably dry skin but still get break outs from time to time. This facial cleanser has changed my life. Does not dry out my skin and has remedied my break outs! hardly ever get blemishes any more! Also recommend following with Hope in a Jar by Philosophy. I have followed this routine religiously ever since i discovered it a couple of years ago and haven't looked back! love my skin now :)
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: There is a very different fragrance to Purity than the last time I ordered it. The initial and subsequent purchases were pretty much fragrance free, this order has a strong pungent odor to it, not liking it at all. Will order direct from Philosophy next purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CKat

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome face wash. Smells wonderful and leaves face feeling clean and fresh!

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cleanser. I use it to take off my makeup, and it gets EVERYTHING off, including eye makeup, even waterproof mascara. I was looking for an alternative to makeup wipes, as they irritate my skin, and this is the perfect product. It doesn't dry out my skin and instead leaves it feeling soft, refreshed, and clean. Great for sensitive skin!!

customer_reviews.text: This is the only face wash I’ll use. I’ve used it for years and absolutely love it. If Nordstrom’s is having their annual sell you can get a huge bottle for cheap

customer_reviews.text: I love purity and the Philosophy brand 😀 I have been using it for many years now and my skin has never looked or felt better 💯 it’s a little more expensive than other brands but so worth it 😀

customer_reviews.title: Now my absolute FAVORITE facial cleanser!!!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive, I usually have a hard time finding a face wash that does not irritate my skin. I decided to try this one out after my friend recommended it to me. It is hands down the best face wash you can possibly purchase. There is basically no scent to it. It is super gentle, yet takes all your makeup off! I will definitely be repurchasing it again!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Azarov

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this face wash. I've been using it for 3 years now and it's the only face wash I've ever used that doesn't break me out and cleans thoroughly. Plus the scent is heavenly, and it makes my skin so soft.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: It made me say  "WOW."
customer_reviews.text: I had seen several presentations on this on QVC, and wondered if it really did what was claimed. It claims that it gets makeup off in one step, and you do not need toner. When I used it for the first time, I said WOW! It got mascara off like I had never been able to get it off before, and my face did feel as though I had used toner; it did not feel tight,just clean. No more extra steps for toner and eye makeup remover, because Purity Made Simple does it all. Amazon has it on Subscribe and Save, so I will order it that way next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela U. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Multi Generational
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It arrived on time. This cleanser is great for all skin types...and for everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Sweater lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Gentle Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This has always been a favorite of mine. It is very gentle on sensitive skin, and it helps control my hormonal breakouts without drying out my skin. I've used so many other "gentle" cleansers more affordable and more expensive, and I always come back to Purity!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY not real brand and product
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this from amazon. I am so mad and upset with Amazon for this product. I don’t know what they put in this product and it has made my face look awful. This is not the purity brand I love. It has broke my face out and the smell is so different from the REAL product. I would never buy another beauty project from amazon ever!!!

product_meta.description: Size:16 Fl Ozphilosophy's award-winning facial cleanser is loved by all for its multitasking, 3-in-1 approach to cleansing. formulated with meadowfoam seed oil that helps lightly hydrate, leaving the skin comfortable, not pulled or tight. also formulated with a twelve-essential oils blend (including rosewood, sandalwood, sage) that helps soften, soothe, and rejuvenate the skin. philosophy's best face wash leaves skin feeling perfectly clean, comfortable and balanced.
